title: Setup
instructions: Install this package: npm install next-work
Add our Chrome Extension to your library by downloading it here. The extension creates a new panel in your Chrome Dev Tools that mimics the Network Panel.
Finally, to include nextWorkFetch in your Next dev environment run npm run nextWorkDev. A script will be automatically created in your package.json.

features: Works with Node V19 and below...

additionalResources.articleDiscussion: For more information regarding the importance of having access to network request data during development, take a look at our recently published article here.
additionalResources.secondary: With our NextWork dev panel you can inspect HTTP communications, helping to debug api calls and optimize application performance.

hero.title: NextWork
hero.subtitle: A developer tool for watching HTTP network requests and responses in server-side rendered components.

texts: Ah, the joys of being a server - doing all the hard work and getting none of the credit!
I wonder if the client even knows how much I'm doing for them right now?
If a request is made on the server and no one is around to see it, did it really happen?
If I were a superhero, my power would be handling HTTP requests like a boss.
I may not have a face, but I have a purpose, and that's good enough for me.
